text: Alif, Laam, Ra. (Insiguro yizi ndome hamwe n’uwufise ubumenyi bwazo zose n’Imana yonyene gusa). Iki gitabu twakimanuriye kuri wewe kugira ngo ubakure abantu mumwijima ubashire mumuco kw’itegeko ry’Umuremyi wabo, hanyuma ubashikane munzira yurya nyene intsinzi kandi ahayagizwa hose nayo ikaba ari Imana
